Email_duplicated: Email already in use, please log in
Code_reset_error: Invalid reset code or email does not match.
Code_reset_expired: Reset code expired. Request a new password reset.
password_reset: Password successfully reset. You can now log in with your new password.
confirmPassword: The two passwords entered do not match.
googlePassword: Unable to change password: account created with Google
privacyPolicy: You must accept the Privacy Policy to register.
connection_ip: Too many registrations from this IP. Please try again later.
password_error: This password is too common or compromised. Choose another one.
email_invalid: Email is required for password reset.
email_changed: Email updated! Check your new inbox.
access_id: Access denied. No resource ID provided.
NoOwner: Access denied. You are not the owner or administrator of the data.
blocked_access: Access denied. Only administrators can perform this action.
verification_email_sent: New verification email sent. Check your inbox.
account_maxVerificationEmails: You have reached the maximum number of sends. Contact support.
email_verified_success: Email successfully verified! You can now log in.
email_same: The new email is the same as the current one.
email_reset: If a user with this email exists, a password reset email has been sent.
email_error: An error occurred while sending the reset email. Please try again later.
account_blocked: Account blocked. Try again in {{time}} seconds.
account_google: Account created via Google: log in with Google.
account_ban: Your account has been banned. Contact support (info@snakebee.it) for more information.
account_notVerify: Email not verified. Check your inbox for the verification code.
account_manyAttempts: Too many failed attempts. Account locked for {{lockout}} minutes.
server_error: Server error, try again later or contact support!
user_notFound: User not found, try logging in again
user_NotModifyRole: You cannot change your own role.
premium_only_feature: This feature is reserved for Premium users only
delete_successfully: User and associated data successfully deleted
subscription_downgrade: Automatic downgrade not supported. Cancel the current subscription and subscribe again to the Basic plan
subscription_errorModify: Selected the same plan. No changes made.
subscription_delete: The subscription cancellation has been scheduled for the end of the subscription period.
reptile_notFoundID: No reptile found for this user
reptile_limit: You have reached the maximum limit ( {{reptiles}} ) of reptiles for the {{plan}} plan
reptile_limit_image: Your {{plan}} plan allows a maximum of {{imagesPerReptile}} images per reptile.
reptile_delete: Reptile and associated data successfully deleted
eventLimit: Maximum limit of {{eventsPerTypePerReptile}} events of type {{typ}} reached for this reptile. Upgrade to the Basic plan for unlimited events.
eventNotFound: Custom event not found or not yours
name: Name
label: Label
breeding_same_reptile: Male and female cannot be the same reptile
breeding_reptile_notFound: One or both reptiles do not exist
breeding_duplicate_year: This pair already exists for this year
breeding_event_same_week: Event "{{type}}" already exists in this week

rateLimit.refresh: Too many refresh attempts. Please try again later.
rateLimit.login: Too many login attempts. Please try again later.
rateLimit.register: Too many registration attempts. Please try again later.

token_warn: Token reuse detected. All sessions have been cancelled.
feeding_notification_message: Your reptiles {{reptiles}} need to be fed today.
feeding_email_text:
Hi {{userName}},

Today is feeding day for your reptiles: {{reptiles}}.

Remember to feed them and update their status from your dashboard!

Go to: {{frontendUrl}}/dashboard

You are receiving this email because you have enabled feeding notifications on SnakeBee.
You can disable them from your account settings.
feeding_email_html:
It's time to feed your reptiles! üêçüçΩÔ∏è

Hi {{userName}},

Today is feeding day for the following reptiles:

    {{#each reptiles}}
  • üê¢ {{this}}
    • {{/each}}

Remember to update the feeding status once completed!

Go to Dashboard

You are receiving this email because you have enabled feeding notifications on SnakeBee.
You can disable them anytime from your account settings.

notification.activeStripe_subscription: Your subscription to the {{subscription}} plan has been successfully activated.

activeStripe_subscription.subject: Your subscription is active! üéâ
activeStripe_subscription.html:
Hi {{name}},

Your payment has been received and your subscription to the {{subscription}} plan is now active. Thank you for joining us!

emails.automaticNotificationNote: This is an automatic notification. Do not reply to this email.

errorStripe_subscription.subject: ‚ö†Ô∏è Problem with your subscription payment
errorStripe_subscription.html:
Hi {{name}},

We were unable to process the payment for your subscription renewal. Please update your payment information in your profile.

updateStripe_subscription.subject: Your subscription has been updated
updateStripe_subscription.html:
Hi {{name}},

Your subscription has been successfully updated to the {{Plan}} plan.

cancelStripe_subscription.subject: Your subscription has been cancelled
cancelStripe_subscription.html:
Hi {{name}}

As requested, your subscription has been cancelled. We are sorry to see you go!

delete_user.subject: SnakeBee account deletion confirmation
delete_user.html:
Hi {{name}},
we confirm that your account has been successfully deleted, including all associated data and subscription.
delete_user.text: Hi {{name}}, we confirm that your account has been successfully deleted, including all associated data and subscription.

verification.ignore: If you did not request this registration, please ignore this email.

errors.daysPositiveInt: Days until next feeding must be a positive integer
